item.title: Rong add a quote by Italo Calvino
item.description: "Who are we, who is each one of us, if not a combination of experiences, information, books we have read, things imagined? Each life is an encyclopedia, a library, an inventory of objects, a series of styles, and everything can be constantly shuffled and reordered in every way conceivable." -- Italo Calvino

item.title: Rong add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "What Is Love? I have met in the streets a very poor young man who was in love. His hat was old, his coat worn, the water passed through his shoes and the stars through his soul" -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Rong add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Rong add a quote by Tom Stoppard
item.description: "Success in life is to maintain this ecstasy, to burn always with this hard gemlike flame. " -- Tom Stoppard

item.title: Rong add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Why do you go away? So that you can come back. So that you can see the place you came from with new eyes and extra colors. And the people there see you differently, too. Coming back to where you started is not the same as never leaving." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Rong add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the road less traveled by and they CANCELLED MY FRIKKIN' SHOW. I totally shoulda took the road that had all those people on it. Damn." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Rong add a quote by Phil Cousineau
item.description: "Centuries of travel yore suggest that when we no longer know where to turn, our real journey has just begun." -- Phil Cousineau

item.title: Rong add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Rong add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "People think dreams aren't real just because they aren't made of matter, of particles. Dreams are real. But they are made of viewpoints, of images, of memories and puns and lost hopes." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A human being is a part of the whole called by us universe, a part limited in time and space. He experiences himself, his thoughts and feeling as something separated from the rest, a kind of optical delusion of his consciousness. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us. Our task must be to free ourselves from this prison by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "God did not create evil. Just as darkness is the absence of light, evil is the absence of God." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "It would be possible to describe everything scientifically, but it would make no sense; it would be without meaning, as if you described a Beethoven symphony as a variation of wave pressure." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by E.F. Schumacher
item.description: "Any intelligent fool can make things bigger, more complex, and more violent. It takes a touch of genius — and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction." -- E.F. Schumacher

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I want to know God's thoughts - the rest are mere details." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I live in that solitude which is painful in youth, but delicious in the years of maturity." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Dancers are the athletes of God." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Somebody who only reads newspapers and at best books of contemporary authors looks to me like an extremely near-sighted person who scorns eyeglasses. He is completely dependent on the prejudices and fashions of his times, since he never gets to see or hear anything else." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "What really interests me is whether God had any choice in the creation of the World." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Teaching should be such that what is offered is perceived as a valuable gift and not as hard duty. Never regard study as duty but as the enviable opportunity to learn to know the liberating influence of beauty in the realm of the spirit for your own personal joy and to the profit of the community to which your later work belongs." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A society's competitive advantage will come not from how well its schools teach the multiplication and periodic tables, but from how well they stimulate imagination and creativity." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rong add a quote by Osho (single name author)
item.description: "That is the simple secret of happiness. Whatever you are doing, don’t let past move your mind; don’t let future disturb you. Because the past is no more, and the future is not yet. To live in the memories, to live in the imagination, is to live in the non-existential. And when you are living in the non-existential, you are missing that which is existential. Naturally you will be miserable, because you will miss your whole life." -- Osho (single name author)
